name: Loneliness (itch) (carmoIn, Masaaki-ono, yasminf)
description:
"Loneliness" is a game about a slime that feels alone. join him on this short journey to find what will fill his emptiness, love.

The theme fits in the idea of the bond formed by two people... or two slimes.

Game Engine: Unreal

 Controls:

  • A and D to move
  • W or Space to jump
